item.description:
Open from dawn to dusk year round. Wilson Mountain was acquired in 1995. Its 213 Acres protect diverse wildlife habitat and important recreational open space. The property provides panoramic views of Boston and the Blue Hills (we just met the guy who cut the trees to open up the view!) and is the largest remaining piece of open space in Dedham.

Directions
By Car: Off of Route 128/95, Exit 17, Route 135. Head towards Dedham. Parking lot 1/2 mile on right.
item.name: Wilson Mountain Reservation walk
